ds.desc.ds.desc: Open Report;Open OO Runbook Result Report
Open Report;Open OO Flow Result Report

ds.cond.ds.cond: $L.format="activity" and type in $L.file="OO Response" and index("http", 2 in description in $L.filed)>0 and SMOO in $G.system.info=true
$L.format#"activity" and type in $L.file="OO Response" and SMOO in $G.system.info=true and index("Report Link: http", str(description in $L.filed))>0
evaluate(views in $L.env) and lng(denull(views in $L.fc))>0 and index($L.format, {"ocmoptions.l", "ocmoptions.o", "ocmoptions.q"})=0
gui() and type($L.dd.qbe.format)~=2 and $L.dd.reclist~=0 and nullsub($L.mod.columns, true)

ds.exps.1.ds.exps.1: if ($L.exit~="cancel") then if ($return.level>1) then (properties.fields in $L.file=insert(properties.fields in $L.file, 0, 1, $L.roField.Name))
if ($L.exit~="cancel") then if ($return.level>1) then (contents.fields in $L.file=insert(contents.fields in $L.file, 0, 1, $L.roField.Name))
